## adaptLegacyInputProcessorPlugin() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Adapts a legacy InputProcessorPlugin to the unified plugin format.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function adaptLegacyInputProcessorPlugin(legacy: InputProcessorPlugin): ChangeDetectorPlugin;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

legacy


</td><td>

[InputProcessorPlugin](./change-detector-core.inputprocessorplugin.md)


</td><td>

The legacy plugin to adapt


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[ChangeDetectorPlugin](./change-detector-core.changedetectorplugin.md)

A unified ChangeDetectorPlugin

## Remarks

Use this function to convert existing legacy plugins to the new unified format without requiring changes to the plugin itself.

## Example


```typescript
import legacyPlugin from 'some-legacy-plugin';
import { adaptLegacyInputProcessorPlugin } from '@api-extractor-tools/change-detector-core';

const unifiedPlugin = adaptLegacyInputProcessorPlugin(legacyPlugin);
registry.register(unifiedPlugin);
```
